text: @DavidGHFrost @BorisJohnson did say F**k business, so for once he will be keeping his word and will go down as the worst PM in UK history. A government that failed to act swiftly on COVID-19 again displays it’s negligence and corruption associated with Brexit #NotMyPM #ReleaseTheRussiaReport
